pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Sunday, June 5, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

London, Ontario

Private meetings

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with youth organizers at a local high school.

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in community events in memory of the Afzaal family and deliver remarks.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media interested in participating can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
